casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Morris Leavett STITH 173A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2016 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, for Stith, Morris Leavett. Charles G. Whitehead, Assistant Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of June 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of June 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the July 26, 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
